alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Saunders; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 12:18AM CDT until May 18 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Washington County in east central Nebraska... Western Douglas County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valley, or 8 miles west of Elkhorn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waterloo around 1225 AM CDT. Elkhorn, Flanagan Lake and Zorinsky Lake around 1235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bennington and southwestern Omaha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
